entries.meaning: A short, or deliberately shortened tail.
An animal that has a bobtail, such as certain canines or nags.
(agriculture) A tractor which performs without its trailer.

definitionGroups.group: A tractor-trailer that is relatively short in length.

entries.meaning: The tractor unit of a semi-truck without a trailer
(poker, often attributive) An open-ended straight or four flush.

verbs.description: bobtail (third-person singular simple present bobtails, present participle bobtailing, simple past and past participle bobtailed)

entries.meaning: (agriculture) To drive a tractor without its trailer.
examples: He deposits his trailer at a Marten facility in nearby Stockton, and then drives without the trailer - that's called "bobtailing".

entries.meaning: To drive a truck or other vehicle without its trailer.
examples: W.C. Bergmann was supplementing his meager lamplighter's income by "bobtailing"… picking up laundry and cleaning in his horse drawn truck...
